channel.title: Plants Vs. Zombies - Issues
channel.description:
So apparently they took away MJ for a stupid looking dancing disco guy. This is gonna help you get back MJ: [url]https://www.techknight.com/blog/2010/08/11/dancing-zombie-patch-put-dancing-zombie-back-into-plants-vs-zombies/[/url]
My only problem is that my achievements are not reflecting a lot of the stuff I have already done. I am NOT starting all over again for the THIRD time.

item.title: Plants Vs. Zombies - Issues

item.description:
I bought the game as a boxed edition for 9 bucks, so i still have MJ.

item.description:

Thank god I don’t have it on steam, I’ve accuired the game through… well, let’s say, different means.
